com.facebook.buck.rules.coercer

Class LeafTypeCoercer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.coercer.LeafTypeCoercer<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypeCoercer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildRuleTypeCoercer, BuildTargetTypeCoercer, EnumTypeCoercer, IdentityTypeCoercer, LabelTypeCoercer, NumberTypeCoercer, PathTypeCoercer, SourcePathTypeCoercer

    public abstract class LeafTypeCoercer<T>
extends Object
implements TypeCoercer<T>
    Superclass of coercers for non-collection/map types.

    • Method Detail

      • hasElementClass

        public boolean hasElementClass(Class<?>... types)
        Description copied from interface: TypeCoercer
        Returns whether the leaf nodes of this type coercer outputs value that is an instance of the given class or its subclasses. Does not match non-leaf nodes like Map or List.
        Specified by:
        hasElementClass in interface TypeCoercer<T>

      • traverse

        public boolean traverse(Object object,
               TypeCoercer.Traversal traversal)
        Description copied from interface: TypeCoercer
        Traverse an object guided by this TypeCoercer. #{link Traversal#traverse} function will be called once for the object. If the object is a collection or map, it will also recursively traverse all elements of the map. Note that this does not check that the input can be coerced, except with respect to traversal. That is, it will check that the object is a collection before traversing down its members, but will not check that it's indeed a BuildTarget.
        Specified by:
        traverse in interface TypeCoercer<T>
        Returns:
        Whether the traversal succeeded.

      • getOptionalValue

        public Optional<T> getOptionalValue()
        Description copied from interface: TypeCoercer
        Get a value suitable for an Optional field. This will typically be Optional.absent(), but may be some other value, such as an empty collection.
        Specified by:
        getOptionalValue in interface TypeCoercer<T>
        Returns:
        A value suitable for fields of type Optional when no value has been set.
